item.title: Journal
item.description: “Keep a diary, and someday it’ll keep you.” – Mae West

item.title: Game dev
item.description: “Every game brings me closer and closer to making what I imagine, that’s why I could never stop making games.” – Kojima Hideo

item.title: Art
item.description: “I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn’t say any other way - things I had no words for.” – Georgia O’Keeffe

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: HELLO WORLD! I’m André Koga, a 18yr old Brazilian startup founder, game developer, web designer, digital artist, sports lover, scientific Olympiads medalist, and owner of two dogs. Nice to meet you! Want to send a message? -split- Education Accepted in Multiple International Universities University of Toronto, Mississauga - Studies in Computer Science, Mathematics, and Statistics University of Toronto, Scarborough - Co-op Computer Science University of Toronto, Innis College - Studies in Computer Science at the Faculty of Arts and Science University of British Columbia - Bachelor of Applied Science Program Purdue University - Computer Science in the College of Science at West Lafayette Georgia Institute of Technology - Major at Computer Science Colégio Farias Brito, Fortaleza, Ceará - High School Average Grade: 9.
